# [Interview #211: Robert Jordan's Blog: ONE MORE TIME, Entry #4](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=211#4)

#### Robert Jordan

For HotW-Moiraine, yes, the bearded man
*ter'angreal*
could be said to be my Alfred Hitchcock moment. In
*Knife of Dreams*
, you'll learn what it does.
